text: hey guys it's angel so a few weeks ago I
showed you guys how to make a classic
wonton soup and in that video we made
homemade watch so I have some leftover
shrimp and pork frozen wontons and today
I'm going to show you how you can use
these wontons to make a quick and easy
appetizer so if you didn't want soup and
you wanted a nice we can eat the
appetizer this is a dish for you now
what we're making our spicy wontons
or one time in a spicy chili oil sauce
and they're super delicious the best
thing about this is that you can make it
as spicy as you want so what's that
let's get started first let's make the
spicy chili sauce
in a small pan on low heat add two
tablespoons of soy sauce one-and-a-half
teaspoons of cane sugar and 1 clove of
fresh garlic peeled and minced
cook and stir over low heat until the
sugar has completely dissolved cooking
will also help infuse the garlic flavors
into the sauce when you're done transfer
the sauce to a small bowl then continue
to add the other ingredients for the
other ingredients you'll need
one-and-a-half teaspoons of Chinese
black vinegar also known as gen Jiang
vinegar now black vinegar is not all the
same so make sure you keep an eye out
for gen Jiang when you're out grocery
shopping then add one tablespoon of
chili garlic sauce adjust more or less
based on your preferences and then 1/2 a
teaspoon of chili oil finally a drizzle
of Asian sesame oil
then mix and set aside while we cook our
wontons
bring a small pot of water to a boil and
cook the frozen wontons for five to
eight minutes or until the wontons are
floating and the wrappers are
translucent and fully cooked
when you're done drain the wontons and
put them into a serving bowl then while
they're still hot add your freshly made
chili sauce
garnish with some green onion and
finally some toasted sesame seeds
so this is how you make shrimp and pork
wontons in a spicy sauce it's a
delicious appetizer and it's another way
that you can prepare homemade wontons at
house give me a thumbs up if you liked
this video and let me know in the
comments below if you love wontons
dumplings and pot stickers that sort of
thing and maybe I'll do a video tutorial
on one of those in the future so don't
forget to subscribe to our Channel and I
will see you guys next time bye
you
